$schema: Preference Mapping Schema for aMule Preferences Parsing
description: Maps JavaScript preference keys from aMule preferences page to C# PreferenceModel properties. Eliminates the 200+ line switch statement.

max_line_up_cap.description: Maximum line upload capacity for statistics

max_line_down_cap.description: Maximum line download capacity for statistics

new_files_paused.description: Add new files to download queue in paused mode (1=true, 0=false)

new_files_auto_dl_prio.description: Automatically set priority for new downloads (1=true, 0=false)

new_files_auto_ul_prio.description: Automatically set priority for new shared files (1=true, 0=false)

alloc_full.description: Allocate full disk space for part files (1=true, 0=false)

check_free_space.description: Check free disk space before downloading (1=true, 0=false)

use_gzip.description: Use gzip compression for web interface (1=true, 0=false)

_notes.usage: PreferencesParser loads this JSON to map JavaScript preference keys to C# properties
_notes.maintenance: Add new mappings here when aMule adds new preferences - no code changes needed

type_explanation.string: Value is used as-is (e.g., port numbers, rates)
type_explanation.bool: Value is '1' (true) or '0' (false), converted to C# bool

_notes.ignored_explanation: These keys exist in aMule HTML but are commented out in the original parser (lines 989-1015)
